data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Beja words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Beja, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Beja, Portugal. Please, stir the 5,673 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 161,200 people living in Beja.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Beja, Portugal.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people know you.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Beja who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Beja, Portugal with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.section_summary:
the state of Beja, Portugal has a population of 161,200.

We estimate Beja has 5,673 people who might know Jesus, 143,902 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,625 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 5,673 believers find a person of peace today among the 155,527 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
